aima.core.probability.bayes.impl
Class FullCPTNode

java.lang.Object
  aima.core.probability.bayes.impl.AbstractNode
      aima.core.probability.bayes.impl.FullCPTNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
DiscreteNode, FiniteNode, Node
public class FullCPTNode
extends AbstractNode
implements FiniteNode

Default implementation of the FiniteNode interface that uses a fully specified Conditional Probability Table to represent the Node's conditional distribution.

Author:
Ciaran O'Reilly
